channel.title: Faq - scar
channel.description:
Hello and welcome to my SCAR faq:
Q. Who created SCAR? A.SCAR was created by someone called Kaitnieks.
Q. What does SCAR mean? A. SCAR actually means Shit Compared to Auto Rune
Q. Is SCAR easy to learn? A. It depends if you have a good memory and you can understans some complicated stuff.
Q. What language was SCAR created with? A. SCAR was created using Delphi.
Q. What's a include? A. A include is what you can add to your script to make it better.
Q. What's the best include? A. Well i would say the main one people user is SRL.
Q. Where can i download SRL? A. You can downlaod SRL 3.4 at http://www.villu-reborn.com
Q. Where can i find some SCAR tuts? A. Well there is many different sites you can find tut there is some here on mopar.
Q. My SCAR says when i compile it that i need a include i got the include i jsut dont know where to put it? A. Put in in your include folder which can be located at c:\program files/scar 2.03/ includes.
Q. Do script still wokr cause jagex made major updates? A. Yes SRl has updated so the script will still work.
That is my Faq i hope this helped you. thanks.

item.title: Faq - scar
item.dc:creator: @arr0w Arr0w
item.description:
@arr0w wrote:

Hello and welcome to my SCAR faq:

Q. Who created SCAR?
A.SCAR was created by someone called Kaitnieks.

Q. What does SCAR mean?
A. SCAR actually means Shit Compared to Auto Rune

Q. Is SCAR easy to learn?
A. It depends if you have a good memory and you can understans some complicated stuff.

Q. What language was SCAR created with?
A. SCAR was created using Delphi.

Q. What’s a include?
A. A include is what you can add to your script to make it better.

Q. What’s the best include?
A. Well i would say the main one people user is SRL.

Q. Where can i download SRL?
A. You can downlaod SRL 3.4 at http://www.villu-reborn.com

Q. Where can i find some SCAR tuts?
A. Well there is many different sites you can find tut there is some here on mopar.

Q. My SCAR says when i compile it that i need a include i got the include i jsut dont know where to put it?
A. Put in in your include folder which can be located at c:\program files/scar 2.03/ includes.

Q. Do script still wokr cause jagex made major updates?
A. Yes SRl has updated so the script will still work.

That is my Faq i hope this helped you. thanks.

Read full topic
